medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with a 1 day history of RUQ/epigastric abdominal pain. He reports 5 episodes of non-bloody, non-bilious emesis. He experienced a similar episode of pain 2 weeks ago that lasted for 4 hours and resolved spontaneously, accompanied by fever to 101.3. Current weight and appetite changes are not noted, although the patient reports some anorexia.
medical_history.family_history: Father and paternal uncle with early cardiac disease requiring surgery in their early years, details unknown.
